select tcustomer.customer_code customerCode, tcustomer.customer_name customerName, tcustomer.customer_acct customerAcc, tcustomer.customer_sex customerSex, tcustomer.customer_phone customerPhone, tcustomer.customer_email customerEmail, tcustomer.customer_id_card customerIdCard from t_order_customer tcustomer, t_store_information tstore where tcustomer.is_delete = 0
and tcustomer.customer_name like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
and tcustomer.customer_acct like concat('%',#{customerAcc},'%')
and tcustomer.shop_code = tstore.shop_code and tstore.shop_con_user = #{userCode}
select user_code userCode, user_role userRole from t_user_infomation where user_code = #{userCode}
